answers.author: Kenneth Decker
answers.text:
We provide cell phones rather than pay a stipend (though we strongly considered the stipend model).  Every year, we audit who has a County-issued cell phone and why.  We monitor use and we've begun the transition to providing a tablet to replace a laptop and cell phone.
